name: Sanford Test Prototype But Better
description:
Instructions:

1, 2, 3, & q to choose music (Space To Turn Off)

Up, Down Left, and Right to control Sanford.

wasd to control pico and Whitty (Go To Week 3 Pressing 6 or go to Whitty pressing 8)

Maps:

Press 4 to go somewhere in Nevada (Default Map)

Press 5 for green screen 

Press 6 For Pico (Week 3)

Press 7 For Tankman (Week 7)

Notes and Credits

Credit To @Jaydenwolf119:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/539774094

Changelog:

2 Player Mode

More Maps

Peace Sign For Sandford Customized
